---
title: "Uniform-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("runif-0-6.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Unif06Call <- stream_in(file("runif-0-6-Call-Revised.jsonl"))
```

6. The Results

```{r}
Unif06Result <- stream_in(file("runif-0-6_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Unif.0.6.OpenAI <- left_join(Unif06Call,Unif06Result)
Full.Unif.0.6 <- left_join(Unif06$params, Unif.0.6.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Unif.0.6.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Unif.0.6$Outcome <- map_chr(Unif06$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Unif06Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Unif.0.6$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Unif.0.6, file="Full.Unif.0.6.RData")
```
